wikipedia_page.main: Roy Oxlade (13 January 1929 – 15 February 2014) was an English painter, writer on art, and an art educator.

response: * 13 January – Roy Oxlade, English painter and critic (d. 2014)
*Roy Oxlade (1929–2014), English painter and writer on art

Since opening her own gallery in 2004, Jacques has developed an exhibition program of both unknown and established artists, representing the estates of artists including Mária Bartuszová, Lygia Clark, Roy Oxlade, Dorothea Tanninghttps://www.blouinartinfo.com/news/story/3338895/alison-jacques-on-her-gallerys-future-plans  and Hannah Wilke.;  Jacques has worked with the estate of Robert Mapplethorpe since 1999. Her curatorial approach has been on unknown bodies of work by Mapplethorpe such as his early Polaroids from the 1970s and his works and sculptures.

response: * February 15 – Roy Oxlade, 85, English painter and critic
Her husband was Roy Oxlade, also a painter. Wylie initially gave up painting to raise their family.
